summary: Tickle the Rainbow, Taste the Gloop! - Behold Rainbow Gloop Tickler, the monstrous creation of cartoonist Matt Furie. This grotesque abomination is a dripping nightmare come to life. With sickly, bright-colored goop seeping from every orifice, and writhing tentacles replacing his mouth, he’s the embodiment of surreal horror. His sinister black eye peers into the darkest depths of the meme universe, promising a descent into madness and dread. As his brain melts and drips southward, Rainbow Gloop Tickler invites you to face the chaos and revel in the macabre.
